Package database

Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Handles connections, queries and updates in the local database. Using SQLite.
Author:
Jeanne Bertrand and Marie Laur

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    DatabaseConnection()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.sql.Connection connect()
    Gets the connection to the database (in the .
    static void createNewTableMessages()
    Creates the messages table (if not exists) with four columns : source IP address destination IP address message text timestamp
    static void createNewTableUsers()
    Creates the users table (if not exists) with two columns : pseudo (with a unique index) IP address
    static void deleteUser​(User user)
    Deletes a user from the users table of the DB.
    static void insertMessage​(Message m)
    Inserts a Message in the messages table of the DB.
    static void insertUser​(User u)
    Inserts a User in the users table of the DB.
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectAllMessages()
    Selects all the messages from the messages table of the DB.
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectAllUsers()
    Selects all the users from the users table of the DB.
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectHistory​(User first, User second)
    Selects all the messages with the couple of given Users in source or destination, in either way.
    static java.lang.String selectIp​(java.lang.String pseudo)
    Returns the IP address of the user with the given pseudo.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public static java.sql.Connection connect()
      Gets the connection to the database (in the ./db directory).
      Returns:
      the connection

    • createNewTableMessages

      public static void createNewTableMessages()
      Creates the messages table (if not exists) with four columns : source IP address destination IP address message text timestamp

    • createNewTableUsers

      public static void createNewTableUsers()
      Creates the users table (if not exists) with two columns : pseudo (with a unique index) IP address

    • insertMessage

      public static void insertMessage​(Message m)
      Inserts a Message in the messages table of the DB.
      Parameters:
      m - the Message

    • insertUser

      public static void insertUser​(User u)
      Inserts a User in the users table of the DB.
      Parameters:
      u - the User

    • selectAllMessages

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectAllMessages()
      Selects all the messages from the messages table of the DB.
      Returns:
      the list of messages in the format "src\tdest\tmessage\tdate\t"

    • selectAllUsers

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectAllUsers()
      Selects all the users from the users table of the DB.
      Returns:
      the list of users in the format "pseudo\tipAddress\t"

    • selectHistory

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectHistory​(User first, User second)
      Selects all the messages with the couple of given Users in source or destination, in either way.
      Parameters:
      first - the first User to be searched for
      second - the second User to be searched for
      Returns:
      the list of messages (same format than selectAllMessages())

    • selectIp

      public static java.lang.String selectIp​(java.lang.String pseudo)
      Returns the IP address of the user with the given pseudo.
      Parameters:
      pseudo - to be searched for
      Returns:
      the IP address

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser​(User user)
      Deletes a user from the users table of the DB.
      Parameters:
      user - to removed
